title: Deceptions
description: ★★★★★ 5 Star Readers' Favorite "Deceptions is superb in my eyes as it held the right level of romance, the right level of adventure, and the perfect level of suspense. I would highly recommend this novel."—Jamie Georgianson, Readers' FavoriteBook Two of a Thrilling Trilogy.Mysteries and secrets continue in this twisted romantic series...New school, new friends, new boyfriend, Heather’s life has finally become somewhat normal. Normal, that is, for a girl who possesses abilities to see visions. What could go wrong?Corruption.Extortion.Lies.And Heather caught in the middle.Secrets and half-truths destroy relationships. Trusts are shattered. As secrets unveil, Heather finds herself with the worst betrayal yet—her own Deception.Will prove all too much for Heather?
author: Kimberly Readnour
